column1: Smoque BBQ////Ordered the sliced brisket and pulled pork platter
column2: added sausage and st louis ribs
column3: with side of brisket chili and mac n cheese. Sliced brisket was very lean and a bit dry but everything else was great. Favorite was the pulled pork
column4: which was surprisingly tender. My favorite sauce was the Spicy Memphis. Also really enjoyed the chili. Portion was small.
